name: Disney's 102 Dalmatians: Puppies to the Rescue
name_original: Disney's 102 Dalmatians: Puppies to the Rescue
description:
Disney's 102 Dalmatians: Puppies to the Rescue is an arcade game developed by Crystal Dynamics and Prolific. It was originally released in 2000. Eidos Interactive published the game. On review aggregator Metacritic, Disney's 102 Dalmatians: Puppies to the Rescue has a score of 66. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
You can play Disney's 102 Dalmatians: Puppies to the Rescue on PC.
